Text:
Thanks, wiiGM! I've been looking for a version of
this game for a long time, but this is the first one
that works with windows 7 64bit.
I have Windows 7 64-bit as well and this works great!  It's easily the most addicting one yet, I have a high score of about 750,000 on both Classic and Poker now :)
